name: 廖義田
objective:
本課程係以工程力學為基礎，進一步說明材料之力學性質。主要包括張力應力與剪力﹔應力與應變分析﹔扭力﹔剪力與彎矩﹔樑中之應力與橈度分析等。
3 point bending , 4 point bending
schedule:
1-4, stress and strain
5-8,3 point bending, 4 point  bending
9-12, bending  moment,torsion
13-16,stress in beam,unidirectional polymer  composite
materials: mechanics of material by  timosencho and gere
